availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Bell (Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Harriet Bell. Father of Burrell Bell, Condis Bell, Elizabeth Bell, Joseph Bell, and Alexander Ellis Bell. Farmer in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 355B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 619.
